CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper July 20, 1957, pg. 10, reads: "Morning Devotions - Every Monday morning the Centre Ave. YMCA Summer Fun Club begins the week with a religious worship service. The group is under the supervision of Jody Harris, boys' director. The boys and girls participate in various activities during the week and are learning to put the Christian back into YMCA. They are shown saluting the flag. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group of girls and boys standing with hands on hearts in pledge during Summer Fun Club, in Centre Avenue YMCA
